column5: Sorry about how I worded the post about the Hamilton Family Fishing Derby. I just looked at the post and realized I said it was tomorrow! It is on AUG. 14th. Guess when you work stupid dumb shifts and ridiculous days off I get mixed up on what day is what.  Hamilton Harbour Fishing Derby Hamilton, Ontario 2010/Aug/14 to 2010/Aug/14 Website:	www.hamiltonwaterfront.com  Sorry if I caused a problem for anyone.
I'll be helping out with the measuring on Saturday.  If you're walking around Pier 8, stop by and say hi.
Yep, this Saturday and I should be there working at the Stelco Fishing Club tent.
